name: V60
instructions: 1. Heat up 300g of water to 198°F
2. Coarsely grind 20g of coffee beans
3. (45sec) Pour 50g of water onto the ground and let bloom.
4. (0:45) Pour 70g of water onto the grounds.
5. (1:30) Pour 60g of water onto the grounds.
6. (2:15) Pour 60g of water onto the grounds.
7. (3:30) Finished. Take coffee dripper off of cup.

name: Chemex
instructions: 1. Heat up 300g of water to 198°F
2. Coarsely grind 20g of coffee beans
3. (45sec) Pour 50g of water onto the ground and let bloom.
4. (0:45) Pour 70g of water onto the grounds.
5. (1:30) Pour 60g of water onto the grounds.
6. (2:15) Pour 60g of water onto the grounds.
7. (3:30) Finished. Take coffee dripper off of cup.

name: Aeropress
instructions: (Inverted Method)
1. Heat up 300g of water to 198°F
2. Coarsely grind 20g of coffee beans
3. (30sec) Pour 50g of water onto grounds and stir with paddle 5 times.
4. (0:30) Pour 150g of water onto the grounds and stir for 15 seconds.
5. Put filter and cap on top of Aeropress.
6. (1:30) Turbulent wiggle and flip Aeropress onto a mug.
7. Press down on Aeropress until you hear a 'hiss' to indicate the water has been drained
8. Pour 100g of hot water into the mug to dilute.

name: Kalita Wave
instructions: 1. Heat up 300g of water to 198°F
2. Coarsely grind 20g of coffee beans.
3. Pre-wet the coffee filter with hot water.
4. Pour coffee grounds into filter and level the bed.
5. (45sec) Pour 50g of water onto grounds and let bloom.
6. (0:45) Pour 160g of water onto grounds.
7. (1:15) Pour 130g of water onto grounds and give the dripper a gentle spin to get grounds off the sides of filter.
8. Let drain and then enjoy.

name: French Press
instructions: 1. Heat up 500g of water to 200°F
2. Grind 30g of coffee beans to medium coarseness.
3. Pour grounds and water into press.
4. Let it sit and brew for 4 minutes.
5. Stir the crust of the brew and scoop the residual top layer of foam out.
6. Let sit and brew for atleast another 5 minutes.
7. Gently push down strainer to the surface of the coffee.
7. Pour and enjoy.

name: Clever Dripper
instructions: 1. Heat up 300g of water to 200°F
2. Coarsely grind 20g of coffee beans
3. Pour 300g of water over grounds
4. Cover Clever and let steep for 2 to 3 minutes (depending on how bold you want your cup to be).
5. After 2 to 3 minutes, open cover and give slurry a gentle stir.
6. Set Clever on top of a mug to drain.

name: Cold Brew
instructions: 1. Heat up 300g of water to 200°F
2. Coarsely grind 20g of coffee beans
3. Pour 300g of water over grounds
4. Cover Clever and let steep for 2 to 3 minutes (depending on how bold you want your cup to be).
5. After 2 to 3 minutes, open cover and give slurry a gentle stir.
6. Set Clever on top of a mug to drain.
